info.name: Project Free TV - Cleaned Up
info.description:
This design is a fixed width layout on a dark background. I changed the logo and lots of other things. I removed a few sections that I thought were not necessary.

Update: Check out the new updated version of this theme: http://userstyles.org/styles/96344/project-free-tv-modern
EDIT: I updated the style to work with the new christmas time layout. I also updated the video player pages with a "dimming" effect.
EDIT #2: Styled up the home page. Increased font sizes. Changed the on hover detail pop up to white text on a black background. Various tweaks and polishes.
info.additionalInfo:
*** New Version *** Check it out over >_> here: http://userstyles.org/styles/96344/project-free-tv-modern

I got tired of looking at orange all the time, but I love Project Free TV, so I made a new style for it. The site is a bit of a pain to stylize since it's using a table based layout with bits and pieces of random styling sprinkled in. I whipped up the logo using Pixelmator. 

I've only tested this on Chrome while using adblock (a Chrome extension) on both OS X and Windows. This also works with Safari, adblock, and stylish, although I had to create a new style and paste the css into it. For some reason it would not apply when just installing through stylish on Safari.
